About Us

A youth organization that focused in Renewable Energy sector.

#RElevatingSREITB

VISION

SRE ITB as a renewable-energy-based community that will accommodate youth's interests and maximize spanotential to generate real-world impact.

OUR

MISSION

Enhancing renewable energy knowledge through basic and advance learning program

Providing exclusive portfolio through hands-on project based on each individuals interests

Maximizing individuals skills through various projects and development programs

Building and maintaining supportive internal relationship to generate significant output

SOCIETY OF
RENEWABLE ENERGY

#RElevatingSRE

WHO'S THE PEOPLE BEHIND SRE ITB?

MANAGEMENT TEAM

The management team of SRE ITB is composed of dedicated individuals who oversee the organization's operations and drive its mission forward. The team also includes various directors responsible for specific areas of focus within SRE ITB.

SRE MEMBER

SRE ITB members are individuals who have participated in the learning programs provided by the SRE ITB focused on renewable energy. As SRE ITB members, they will engaged in various learning activities, such as training sessions, and research projects.
